alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:22PM CDT until July 14 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Southern Harvey County in south central Kansas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 321 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burrton to near Mount Hope to 5 miles south of Haven, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Maize, Halstead, Sedgwick, Burrton, Mount Hope, Kechi and Bentley. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 14 and 26. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
